appDescription: Live countdowns for your favorite festivals & events
not_found_description: The festival or page you're looking for doesn't exist.
blog_p_1: Our countdown timer is more than just a clock. It's your personal portal to the celebrations that matter most. Here's how you can make the most of it.
blog_p_2: Click the "Add to Favorites" button to save this countdown. Your favorite events are always just a click away, making it easy to keep track of multiple upcoming celebrations.
blog_p_3: When you favorite an event, we save it in your browser. The next time you visit, you can filter to see just your favorited events, creating a personalized dashboard of anticipation.
blog_p_4: Anticipation is better when shared! Use the "Share Countdown" feature to spread the excitement with friends and family.
blog_title_5: Share a Link or a Custom Image
blog_p_5: You can copy a direct link to this countdown page or generate a beautiful, shareable image with a custom message. It's perfect for social media, messaging apps, or anywhere you want to build hype.
blog_p_6: Are you a blogger, event organizer, or just want to feature this countdown on your own site? The "Embed Countdown" feature gives you a simple snippet of code to do just that.
blog_p_7: Just copy the provided HTML code and paste it into your website's editor. The embedded countdown is a lightweight, stylish, and live-updating widget that brings the energy of the countdown directly to your audience.
